question: Which state government has constituted "Maa committee" to check mid day meal quality in schools?
explanation: The Uttar Pradesh government has recently constituted \"Maa committee‚Äù to check mid day meal quality in  state-run primary schools to ensure that the students will get nutritious food prepared in hygienic conditions. It will be a committee of six mothers, from all sections of the society, whose students are studying in that school. From cleanliness in kitchen to quality of food being served to children, the committee will keep an eye on minute details.
